Original: 吃完燒烤想續攤無意間找到附近最近的一家，交通其實滿不便的，外面在蓋捷運導致很難通行，店內不大，沙發區只有兩人座位以及五人座位，吧台應該有八個座位，由於我們很吵雜一進門有先詢問老闆，很感謝老闆的體諒讓我們這群吵雜的人有喝酒的著落，一開始因沙發區有人，後來客人走後老闆幫我們安排沙發區實在很貼心，酒類的部分因本人不喝酒所以不予置評，但友人說有的好喝有的普通，如果想要偏酸偏甜老闆也都能特調，我點了座敷童子好喝，味道類似奶蓋之類的，雖然偏甜但是對於無酒精來說大家都大推，老闆一開始看似冷酷但相處一段時間後就會聊開了，還請大家一杯shot，店內低消三百還有抽獎活動，整體這間很適合不想太吵雜或是外人太多時候三五好友微醺的地方，給滿分是因為老闆人很NICE，另一名看似未滿十八歲的林俊傑也是服務很好，值得二訪，建議店家印個menu不然手機版不好閱覽

Original:
逼仄的小店，明明沒有人，不「建議」客人坐沙發區。想選的酒甜點都沒有，圓凳，坐著不舒服，酒太甜膩，音樂是一個女生一直嘶吼，不舒服的體驗。
補評：原本是就事論事的評論店面的商品、規格與服務，結果被店主陰陽怪氣的禮貌人身攻擊品味以及個人評價。Google個人評價就是極好和極低才會讓人想要留。而我的評價從來都是只談及商品與服務本身。比起貴店的評價中那些用全名只有短短幾個字，全部都是五星好評。有好有壞才比較像是真人吧？

以下是這幾點我不滿意的原因。

.逼仄的空間
一進去是兩排長桌，一排是吧台還有一排就是吧台對面的長桌。接著是裡面的五人沙發座以及雙人座，都相鄰廁所。想要不被打擾的聊天只能坐在廁所外面，或是吧台對面。

但是椅子是吧台圓凳難以久坐，後來我們坐不久，實在受不了就搭計程車去另一家店。
如果被美麗照片迷惑而想要來這裡消費的顧客請務必注意空間及椅子的舒適度。只有五個人才可以坐五人沙發區。因為店主下面回覆說過「沒理由讓你兩個人坐五個人的位置吧！」

備料不足的問題
當天是為了圖片上所顯現及其他客人推薦而決定到這家店。但當天兩個熱門產品都沒有。這家店當然不是甜點店，但甜點及特殊的酒類是這家店之所以被選擇的，特色。建議當天不要衝動前往，可以先打電話詢問。

音樂的選擇
我無意批評店家的品味，以及女歌手扯著嗓子唱歌的聲音。畢竟這個非常主觀。一般來說只要不是音樂酒吧通常音樂都會是背景，而不是頻頻干擾聊天。（可能我誤闖歌迷俱樂部了）

酒的甜膩
我們已經頻頻喝水和請人員加冰塊仍然解不了酒的甜膩。（不說酒鬼米酥，事先有詢問過請調酒師推薦有水果味的酒。調酒師推薦有芭樂跟鳳梨味偏酸的一支酒。按：謝謝提醒，刪掉了「不要太甜」，記憶混淆了，因為那是我們逃去下一間店的要求。）建議喜歡偏甜的調酒的人可以嘗試酒鬼米酥和花果山。不是沒有跟店主反應，當下有反應太甜需要加冰塊，加了還是太甜。（這段有影片吧？）

刪改不是害怕，畢竟大家都會截圖，是因為身為一個大人，要意識到自己可能的不完美，說的不夠完善，可能帶給別人的誤解，隨時願意改變。顧著講電話確認座位，沒有等調酒師從吧台走出來，自顧自的走進去，確實不禮貌。被拒絕坐五人沙發時，應該堅持。飲料不滿意應該說到店家換一杯為止，音樂受不了，應該叫店家換掉，聽水晶音樂、古典樂，最最不應該就是留下幾句評價，先是抒發不適感受，再給後人提醒，給店家建議，才會被指為詆毀，變成黑名單。這年頭做個客人真不容易。
EN:
The forced small shop, no one, does not "recommend" guests to sit on the sofa area.There are no wine desserts I want to choose. The round stool is uncomfortable sitting, the wine is too sweet, and the music is a girl who has been roaring and uncomfortable experience.
Make -ups: Originally, the products, specifications and services of the stores that were discussed on the matter were discussed. As a result, the weird person's attack taste and personal evaluation by the owner's yin and yang.Google's personal evaluation is very good and low to make people want to stay.And my evaluation has always been talking about the goods and services itself.Compared to the evaluation of Guidian's evaluation, only a few words are used in full names, all of which are five -star praise.Is it more like a real person?

The following is why I am not satisfied with these points.

.
As soon as I entered, there were two rows of long tables, and there was a row of the bar in the bar. The long table opposite the bar.Then the five sofa and two seats inside were adjacent to the toilet.If you want to chat without disturbing, you can only sit outside the toilet, or opposite the bar.

However, the chair was a baroon stool for a long time. After we sat, we couldn't stand it to take a taxi to another store.
If you are confused by beautiful photos and want to come here, please pay attention to space and chair comfort.Only five people can sit in the sofa area of ​​five people.Because the shop owner responded below, "There is no reason for the two people to sit in the position of five people!"

Insufficient materials
The day was decided to go to this store for the show and other guest recommendations.But there were no two popular products that day.Of course, this shop is not a dessert shop, but desserts and special wines are selected by this shop.It is recommended not to go impulsively on the same day, you can call first.

Music choice
I have no intention of criticizing the taste of the store, and the sound of female singers pulling her throat.After all, this is very subjective.Generally speaking, as long as it is not a music bar, music is usually a background, not frequently interfere with chatting.(Maybe I mistakenly break through the fan club)

Sweetness of wine
We have been drinking water frequently and inviting personnel to add ice cubes.(Not to mention the alcoholic rice crispy, I have asked in advance, please recommend wine with fruit flavor. The bartender recommends a wine that is sour with guava and pineapple. Thank you for reminding. "The memory is confused, because it is the request for our escape to the next store.It is not that there is no response to the owner. At present, the response is too sweet and you need to add ice cubes.(Is there a video in this paragraph?)

Deleting changes is not afraid. After all, everyone will take a screenshot because as an adult, we must realize that they may be imperfect and not perfect. They may bring misunderstandings to others and are willing to change at any time.Talking about the call to confirm the seat, he did not wait for the bartender to come out of the bar, and walked in by himself. It was really impolite.When you are refused to sit on the sofa, you should stick to it.If you are dissatisfied with drinking, you should say that the store will not be able to stand it. The music should be asked to change it. Listening to crystal music and classical music. The most should not leave a few evaluations. First, express the discomfort. Suggestions to the store will be referred to as slander and turned into a blacklist.It's not easy to be a guest these years.
